name: df-psubclN
body: |- wceq(cpscN, cmpt(s0, universe, cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), cfv(catm, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpolN, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cpolN, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cv(s1))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ PSubCl =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 |(s1 ‚äÜ(Atoms ` s0)‚àß((_|_P ` s0)`((_|_P ` s0)` s1))= s1)})
comment: Define set of all closed projective subspaces, which are those sets of atoms that equal their double polarity. Based on definition in [Holland95] p. 223. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jan-2012.)
